short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flowing through the vibes of YouTube video comments in real time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VibeFlow - Real-Time YouTube Comments Experience - Elevate your YouTube watching!🤯

Perfect for tutorials, reactions, debates, and viral moments!💭🥶️

Features:
📍 Real-Time Comments: View community reactions synced to video moments.
🕒 Timestamp Highlighting: Exact moment referenced in a comment.
👍 Comment Likes: See how many likes each comment has received, see most popular reactions.
🤴 User Profile: Click on a user's avatar or nickname to instantly open their YouTube profile.
💬 Reply to Comment: Click comment text to open new tab, clicked comment will be the first highlighted in original YouTube comment section.
💭 Enhanced Interaction: Discover insights, humor, and opinions as they unfold during playback.
🔧 Easy 2min API Key Setup: Quick setup with intuitive guide to unlock full functionality.

Elevate your YouTube watching with VibeFlow💛!

Dive deeper into your favourite YouTube videos with VibeFlow, the ultimate Chrome extension that brings timestamped comments to life! 💛 See what others are saying at specific moments in the video, creating an interactive, immersive experience.

Get Started: Download now and flow through the vibes of your favourite videos.💭
